channel.title: Pages on Passionfruit Kitchen
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Passionfruit Kitchen

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to Passionfruit Kitchen! I’m Kendree, a part-time food blogger and student. I love to cook for my family, and I started this blog to share some of my favorite recipes! I especially enjoy exploring and sharing my Chinese heritage through my cooking – usually with a pescatarian twist!
